email.PatternHelpText: Please enter a valid email address

emailControl.intro_msg: Enter your email address below to receive a reset code.
emailControl.success_send_code_msg: A reset code has been sent to your email. Please copy it into the input box below and verify reset code.
emailControl.success_verify_code_msg: Email address verified. You can continue now.

phoneVerificationControl.intro_msg: Enter your phone number below to receive a reset code.
phoneVerificationControl.success_send_code_msg: A reset code has been sent to your phone. Please copy it into the input box below and verify reset code.
phoneVerificationControl.success_verify_code_msg: Phone number verified. You can continue now.

ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfClaimsPrincipalDoesNotExist: A user with specified credentials could not be found
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfClaimsTransformationBoolean: Your account is deactivated. Please contact your organization.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfVerificationFailedNoRetry: You've made too many incorrect attempts. Please try again later.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfVerificationFailedRetryAllo: The verification has failed, please try again
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfWrongCodeEntered: The code is incorrect, please try again

internationalOrNationalPhoneNumber.HelpText: Invalid number format. Please ensure that the phone number does not contain any special characters such as []{}().

noCorporateEmail.HelpText: It is not possible to reset the password for an account with a KidsLoop email address. Please sign-in instead.

noLeadingPlus.HelpText: You don't need to include your country code here. Instead, please use the dropdown above to select your country code

email.PatternHelpText: Please enter a valid email address

hasAcceptedPrivacyPolicy.UserHelpText: Please agree to the KidsLoop Privacy policy to create an account

newPassword.PatternHelpText: 8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .

emailControl.success_send_code_msg: A verification code has been sent to your email. Please copy it into the input box below and verify the code.
emailControl.success_verify_code_msg: Email address verified. You can continue now.

phoneVerificationControl.success_send_code_msg: A verification code has been sent to your phone. Please copy it into the input box below and verify the code.
phoneVerificationControl.success_verify_code_msg: Phone number verified. You can continue now.

ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfClaimsPrincipalAlreadyExist: An account with this email address or number already exists.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfMaxAllowedCodeRetryReached: You've made too many incorrect attempts. Please try again later.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfVerificationFailedNoRetry: You've made too many incorrect attempts. Please try again later.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfVerificationFailedRetryAllo: The code is incorrect. Please try again.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfWrongCodeEntered: The code is incorrect, please try again

newPassword.PatternHelpText: 8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .

UXElement.initial_intro: Almost there! Enter your new password below.

internationalOrNationalPhoneNumber.HelpText: Invalid number format. Please ensure that the phone number does not contain any special characters such as []{}().

noLeadingPlus.HelpText: You don't need to include your country code here. Instead, please use the dropdown above to select your country code

ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfClaimsPrincipalDoesNotExist: Due to a system upgrade you will have to reset your account password. If you have already done this and are getting this message, then you have entered an invalid password. Please try again or click on the 'Forgot password' link if you need to reset your password.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfInvalidPassword: Due to a system upgrade you will have to reset your account password. If you have already done this and are getting this message, then you have entered an invalid password. Please try again or click on the 'Forgot password' link if you need to reset your password.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfOldPasswordUsed: Due to a system upgrade you will have to reset your account password. If you have already done this and are getting this message, then you have entered an invalid password. Please try again or click on the 'Forgot password' link if you need to reset your password.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfUserAccountDisabled: Your account is deactivated. Please contact your organization.
ErrorMessage.UserMessageIfUserAccountLocked: You have tried to login incorrectly too many times. Please wait and try again later.
